name: Dynamic text game
description:
Left  click : select/drop letters

Return/Space : shuffle letters

Scrabble is an interactive game where you find the hidden word and have fun doing so. 

With this project my goal was to get started with UI elements and add some conditions. To get this working it took me uncountable head scratches figuring out different elements of interactivity to get working. 

Things I learnt :

- Drag and drop objects

- Switching scenes using buttons

- Using scripts
